body_html:
Ping. Note that most of the TensorArray code was written by @ebrevdo. @ebrevdo would you be willing to share some insight on this?

My best guess here is that we need something like an unpack for a TensorArray, which would return the internal Tensors that we need, so the code would be something like

list_of_tensors = x_ta.unpack()
dloss_dx = tf.gradients(loss, list_of_tensors)

Ping. Note that most of the TensorArray code was written by @ebrevdo. @ebrevdo would you be willing to share some insight on this?
My best guess here is that we need something like an unpack for a TensorArray, which would return the internal Tensors that we need, so the code would be something like
list_of_tensors = x_ta.unpack()
dloss_dx = tf.gradients(loss, list_of_tensors)
body:
Ping. Note that most of the `TensorArray` code was written by @ebrevdo. @ebrevdo would you be willing to share some insight on this?

My best guess here is that we need something like an `unpack` for a `TensorArray`, which would return the internal `Tensor`s that we need, so the code would be something like

```
list_of_tensors = x_ta.unpack()
dloss_dx = tf.gradients(loss, list_of_tensors)
```
